CREATE SCHEMA gold 

CREATE VIEW gold.applicant_risk_profiles
AS
SELECT
    SK_ID_CURR,
    AMT_INCOME_TOTAL,
    AMT_CREDIT,
    total_credit_debt,
    previous_app_count,
    avg_prev_annuity,
    credit_utilization_ratio,

    -- Derived metrics
    ROUND(CAST(total_credit_debt AS FLOAT) / NULLIF(AMT_INCOME_TOTAL, 0), 4) AS debt_to_income_ratio,
    ROUND(CAST(AMT_INCOME_TOTAL AS FLOAT) / NULLIF(AMT_CREDIT, 0), 4) AS income_to_credit_ratio

FROM silver.applicant_profiles_view

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://crdpadlsdev.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/applicant_profiles',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS result1

SELECT
    COUNT(*) AS total_applicants,
    ROUND(AVG(AMT_INCOME_TOTAL), 2) AS avg_income,
    ROUND(AVG(AMT_CREDIT), 2) AS avg_credit_amount,
    ROUND(AVG(total_credit_debt), 2) AS avg_total_debt,
    ROUND(AVG(CAST(total_credit_debt AS FLOAT) / NULLIF(AMT_INCOME_TOTAL, 0)), 4) AS avg_debt_to_income_ratio,
    ROUND(AVG(CAST(AMT_INCOME_TOTAL AS FLOAT) / NULLIF(AMT_CREDIT, 0)), 4) AS avg_income_to_credit_ratio,
    ROUND(AVG(credit_utilization_ratio), 4) AS avg_credit_utilization

FROM silver.applicant_profiles_view
